about_the_game:
S.P.L.I.C.E.D.

Take on the role of a strong-willed woman determined to challenge the tyranny of the mob leader Jiaolong and free Chinatown from their oppressor in this 3D side scroller action adventure, Metroidvania. Discover forgotten secrets and powerful weapons that will help you traverse the treacherous streets, as you set off on a dangerous mission to fight the mutants, monsters, and other enemies hiding within.

Features:

  • 3D Side-Scroller Action:
    Embark on a journey with beautifully crafted environments, mixing the depth of 3D landscapes with classic Metroidvania gameplay.


  • Incredible Boss fight:
    Prepare to test your skills against a colossal and menacing boss. Analyze patterns, exploit weaknesses and have your skills tested in this immersive fight.


  • Exploration:
    Beautiful scenery, hidden passages and charming backgrounds. Delve deep into this Biopunk Chinatown world as you try to uncover all of its secrets.


Are you ready to face the oppressor? Your journey awaits in S.P.L.I.C.E.D., the definitive 3D side scroller Metroidvania adventure.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @2.30 GHz or higher / AMD Ryzen 3 @3.00 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 4GB VRAM or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 @2.60 GHz or higher / AMD Ryzen 5 @3.00 GH or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2060 6GB VRAM or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: S.P.L.I.C.E.D. is a FREE Metroidvania made by students from Breda University of Applied Sciences. Traverse a Biopunk Chinatown with high mobility and difficult combat encounters.
